attributes.description:
5 Speed manual with 16\'\' steel wheels with cover.Dual front,side and curtain airbags.ABS barking system. Electronic Stability Control.Emergency Brake Assist.Childproof rear door locks.Remote central locking with Perimeter alarm.Adjustable steering column.Airconditiong manual.Electric Power-Assisted Steering.Cloth seats.60/40 split rear seats that fold flat.Ford SYNC(includes Bluetooth,Voice control,steering-wheel-mounted audio controls,X2 USB Ports with IPod functionality).4.2\'\' Colour non-touch 
Company Demo!! Best Selling Compact SUV in South Africa, Service Intervals Every 15 000 Kms on the Diesel Models and Every 20 000 Kms on the Petrol Derivatives, Balance of 4-Yr/120 000 Km Factory Warranty, Balance of 4-Yr/60 000 km Service Plan. Trade Ins are Welcome, Finance can be arranged in house with All Major Banking Institutions, We are Also Able to Assist with Countrywide Delivery in Required.

attributes.description: In the market for a vehicle? We have you covered, All our vehicles passes a Ford approved 160 point quality check, we provide a roadworthy certificate on delivery and proof of service history. We offer a selection of finance option through all major banks. We do accept trade ins. To apply for finance we will need the following: ID, Drivers license, Latest payslip, 3 Months bank statements & Proof of address! Want to chat and find out a bit more? Give us a call and chat to one of our friendly staff members!
